review_blob: Honestly, I should have tried this out of a Chimay type glass but I didnt...so I found this particular ale to be a wee bit tarty on the tongue to start combined with a smell that let u know it was there and that it was strong...overall not trrrble but not on par with the likes of Chimay.

Uggghhh...maybe I tasted this on a bad day when my sense of smell was off and my tastebuds were in disarray but all I can say is awful based on my initial experience. Couldnt get over the staining blackness of its colour combined the unaromatic smell being emitted and then the trrrble taste that hit my tongue... Overall nastiness from this guy.
Can notice hints of citrus in both the taste and aroma.  While not the biggest fan of wheaty or citrusy beer this one I can handle in small doses.
